knimeNode.name: SHAP Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: End node for a SHAP loop

fullDescription.intro: Aggregates the predictions per row to explain and calculates the Shapley Values for each feature-prediction combination. Has nothing to configure because it receives its configuration from the loop start node. Please see the Shapley Values Loop Start node for details on Shapley Values and how to use this loop.

inPort.name: Table containing the rows to explain.

ports.inPort: Table containing predictions for the perturbed rows produced by the Shapley Values Loop Start node
ports.outPort: Table containing the Shapley Values for each feature-prediction combination
